name: Neo-Corrupt
description: It is used in most turrets for more defense and thus avoid corruption.
details: Regnium purifying material, this material served during the wars between the corrupt-threshers until today, it is still used together with another material more effective against Regnium, found in the most distant parts of Endlevour, it was brought to Serpulo and cultivated in machines where they are synthesized more.
